name: Filter Search Page
author: Alexandru Vornicescu

sections.description: If you want to exclude some post types or terms from the search page then this plugin is for you.
sections.installation:
1. Unzip
  2. Upload “filter-search-page” folder to the “/wp-content/plugins/” directory
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  4. To change the settings, go to Dashboard -> Plugins -> Filter Search Page.
  5. That’s it!
sections.faq:
Why should I use this plugin?

The default WordPress settings does not have the option to filter the search page, so this plugin brings the option to do so.

Will it break any other plugins?

I don’t think so.

Won’t this conflict with plugins?

Well I can’t tell for sure.

Can you add a feature X?

Depends, if its useful enough and I have time for it.

short_description: This plugin will help you to filter the search page results by category and post type.
description: If you want to exclude some post types or terms from the search page then this plugin is for you.
